Assistant Sales Manager Job at EMR Mining Limited




        
    

        
        EMR Mining Limited is a leading granite quarry company specializing in the extraction, processing, and sales of premium granite aggregates. Our core market is the construction industry in Lagos and Oyo States.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Assistant Sales Manager

Job Locations: Ibadan, Oyo and Lagos

Role Summary
     

            
    




	We are looking for a results-oriented Assistant Sales Manager to drive sales growth and expand our customer base in the construction sector.
	The ideal candidate is a Civil Engineer or Builder with strong industry knowledge and an established professional network.


Key Requirements


	B.Sc. in Civil Engineering or Building Technology
	4 - 5 years of experience in building materials sales
	Member of NSE or NIOB
	Age between 27 and 40 years
	Strong network of construction professionals in Lagos and Ibadan
	Excellent communication and negotiation skills
	Proven ability to close deals and build long-term partnerships
	Self-driven, with the ability to work independently
	Passion for selling, customer engagement, and revenue generation
	Ability to leverage technical background to influence buying decisions


Method of Application
Interested and qualified applicants should send their CV to: careers@eagleeyeops.com using "Assistant Sales Manager Application" as the subject of the email.

	Great with people, reliable, and discreet with information
	Must be available to work physically (not remote).


Salary
N80,000 Monthly

Method of Application
